ruleset.name: PEAR - Functions
ruleset.description: Sniffs related to functions calling and declarations.

rule.name: FunctionCallSignature
rule.description: Enforces function call signatures "foo($a, $b, $c)" style reporting all other whitespaces.

property.name: indent
property.description: The number of spaces code should be indented.

property.name: allowMultipleArguments
property.description: If TRUE, multiple arguments can be defined per line in a multi-line call.

rule.name: FunctionDeclaration
rule.description:
Enforces single and multi-line function declarations to defined correctly.
Single line declarations follow the Generic BSD-Allman brace sniff. For multi line declarations see the example.

rule.name: ValidDefaultValue
rule.description: Ensure that parameters defined for a function that have a default value come at the end of the function signature.
